patterns: Is it too cold in iit mandi?
responses: It has 3 distinct seasons- Winter(November-March), Summer(April-June) and Monsoon(July-September). It is warm and pleasant during April-October. The Maximum temperature tends to exceed 30° C. There is a huge variation in temperature daily and also between day and night time. Most of the time the weather is pleasant. Winters are freezing when snow descends to around 1200 m ASL. On 14th December,2014, a Sunday, there was heavy snowfall in Kamand. From 12:30 pm onwards, it started to precipitate. At first, a heavy winter shower occurred and was replaced by small white snow,which was followed by heavy snowfall ,which resembled large cottony flakes. Within a while,the 3 Mountains were covered with white snow caps.It was for the first time known, Kamand experienced snowfall. It was all of a sudden,not expected by the weather forecast. There was a blockage in the road connecting Kamand and Mandi due to the slippery snow-covering. It was later cleared by using an excavator.
In the working days it is not too cold, Most of the time the weather is pleasant. Winters are freezing when snow descends to around 1200 m ASL.

patterns: How is it like to be in iit mandi?
What is the best part of iit mandi?
What do you like about iit mandi?
What can I expect from iit mandi?
Explain about iit mandi in a nutshell.
responses: IIT Mandi is a great place for growth and making memories worth remembering. It feels great to be in IIT Mandi, the pollution free environment, the splendid  beauty of the valley adds a great impact on overall experience. The college is improving after each year with really appreciable academics curriculum and career opportunities.

patterns: Does the winter affects the vacations IIT Mandi?
What are the various vacations in IIT Mandi ?
responses: The cold weather starts around the Diwali and will remain till late march.The winter season is the worst part of the Mandi.(that is why IIT Mandi gives  2 months winter vacation ).So you are advised to bring blanket with you as cold start drifting from august itself.
For a detailed insight of vacations you can go through the academic calender of IIT Mandi at https://iitmandi.ac.in/academics/calendar.php

patterns: How is the coding culture of iit mandi?
What is our position in coding compared to other new IITs
Where do we stand in coding with other 2nd generation IITs?
responses: IIT Mandi has a decent Coding Culture and it is improving at a very fast pace, IIT Mandi has rocked this year in GSoC selections although we have a room of improvement ICPC, overall it will be a good experience with coding over here ; )

Here are some recent stats: GSoC selections for 2020: Indore : 3 students Ropar : 2 students Patna : 6 students Hyderabad : 1 student Bhubaneswar : 1 student Gandhinagar : None from their college knows (I think 0) Mandi : 9 students + 6 mentors. Also there is a room for improvement  in ICPC(competitive programming), we are improving upon that too year by year. Open source culture is better at our college. as shown by GSoC selections. Apart from the GSoC selections, many were also selected in Linux community bridge, which is an equally prestigious program.

patterns: How are the placements in IIT Mandi ?
Give some insights on recent placements
Does the location of iit mandi affects its placements?
How is the placement of core branches?
How wide is the alumni network of iit mandi?
responses: IIT Mandi has a decent placement record and it is improving year by year.You can find more about it over here - https: //collegedunia.com/university/25559-indian-institute-of-technology-iit-mandi/placement

IIT Mandi has recently completed its placement cycle for the year 2020. The institute provides placement offers for all the postgraduate and undergraduate courses. The placement drive for the year 2019-2020 successfully completed with 85% offers to the undergraduate students registered for the placement drive. The institute also recorded the highest number of offers(142) which were provided to 101 studen.

Some of the renowned recruiters of final placements 2020 included HPCL, Microsoft, Amazon, Goldman Sachs, DE Shaw, Optum, Tonichi Insatsu, Robert Bosch, etc.Location doesn 't stop a student to show his/her potential. As IIT Mandi is no more a very new college it has developed and is developing its alumni network with a faster pace as the number of students in a new passing batch is more than the previous one.

patterns: What Clothes do we need to bring
What kind of clothes we need to bring
responses: IIT Mandi has quite a long winters. You need winter clothing since October until March in IIT Mandi. November-Feb have extreme cold weather, so pack accordingly. Also umbrella here is a necessity as it can rain anytime here.Quilt and Blankets are Require by October. Also Both Formal and Informal clothes are recommended

Due to chilly winters, you are advised to bring winter clothes, Blankets and other stuff accordingly. Most of the time studens wear informal clothes, even when we have to go to lectures, but you don't want to look dull in Fresher's Party, so both formal and informal clothes are recommended.

Immaterial of the branch you are in, you would need access to computer for doing assignments and course work. It would be good if you can bring your own laptop, but in case you are not able to, you can always go to the PC lab. For students taking education loan, purchase of laptop is included in the loan agreement by most banks.

patterns: How many people lives in one room
How many occupants are there of one room”,”Is there a cupboard in Hostel room
responses: There are 3 kinds of rooms,with single occupant, with two occupants and the most common are with three occupants. Single occupant rooms are primarily not available for first yearites. Do not bring any high power consuming electric items like electric cooker, water heater etc. They are fire hazards and are strictly prohibited in the hostels.

patterns: is there any education loan at iit mandi
can i apply for education loan
responses: As of 2020, IIT-Mandi does not have tie-up with any institution providing education loan. Please get in touch with a bank of your choice for details on Education loan. To know more visit 'https://www.iitmandi.ac.in/gcs/educationloan.php'

patterns: what is there to visit in iit mandi
where can i go for trips from iit mandi
is kullu manali near iit mandi
how to reach shimla form iit mandi
responses: Mandi being the only way to reach nation-wide famous Hill Stations, Kullu, Manali and Shimla makes it very convenient to visit them. There are frequent buses and it take only a few hours to reach Manali from Mandi. Not only these there are many places even nearer to campus like Prashar Lake which are worth paying visit.

Belive it or not, IIT Mandi itself is a beautiful place and there are lots of places where you can visit in the campus area itself(after you have gained experience in 5WIP).If you want to go to a trip but only have a weekend, don't worry, there are places like Prashar, Rewalsar and many others which are worth a visit. Not only this famous hill stations like Kullu, Manali and Shimla are a few hours away from the campus. But remember 'Safety first :)'

You have a talent, show it in a club, you don't have a talent, don't worry, at IIT Mandi each student is allowed to join any number of clubs either to learn something or to teach something. Even you start something from ground zero, you are most welcome to be a part of any group you want to be in. To know what clubs IIT Mandi has visit : 'https://wiki.iitmandi.co.in/p/List_of_Societies_and_Clubs'.

Intrested in joining clubs, here's a tip : 'Don't be afraid of spleaking or showing your talent'. That's it, nothing more. You can even learn from ground level are every club organize informal sessions for that too. To know what clubs are there in IIT Mandi visit 'https://wiki.iitmandi.co.in/p/List_of_Societies_and_Clubs'

patterns: how is the food at IIT Mandi
Do you like food at mess?
can we eat food other than mess
how many canteens are there in campus
how is mess food at iit mandi
responses: Even though Mess food is quite good and what we call a proper blanced diet, if someone wants to change there taste then there are 3 canteens in north campus and  a few in south campus. Food at canteen is also good and every canteen is as hygienic at it can be.
Even though mess food provides a lot of variety and is also quite good in taste, if someone wants to eat fast food like burger, pizza then canteen provides decent options with great hygiene.

patterns: what do you know about iit mandi
is iit mandi a good college
responses: IIT Mandi's permanent campus (about 14 km from Mandi) is fully functional on the left bank of the Uhl River at Kamand and Salgi villages in Mandi . Timothy A. Gonsalves is the founding Director (15/1/2010-30/6/2020) of IIT Mandi and R. C. Sawhney served as the first Registrar. Prof. Ajit Kumar Chaturvedi, Director, IIT Roorkee took charge as Acting Director from 1st July, 2020.
